main.name: Yi Zu
main.description: I have a passion for building social impact technologies and consumer products that have an influence on people's lifestyles. Determined, organized, team oriented, multicultural and enthusiastic. I love learning visually and kinesthetically to gain depth of knowledge in the work place. In my free time, I love staying fit, traveling and watching soccer.
main.bio: Growing up in Italy from a Chinese family, I love embracing diversity and different cultures in my personal and professional life. I Love building social impact products in the fitness and education space to empower youth in the world. I specialize in building user interfaces in JavaScript, HTML, CSS and React.
main.contactmessage: Looking to for junior software jobs/internships. Contact me if you see a fit with my personality and work experience.

resume.skillmessage: These are the technologies that I love to tinker and build awesome stuff

education.description: Relevant coursework: Introduction to Programming in Java, HTML5 & CSS & JavaScript, Human-Computer Interaction Programming Studio, Interaction Design, Linear Algebra

education.degree: B.A. Economics, B.S.B.A. Concentration in Strategy and Innovation

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
